text:
this worked for me
```using CairoMakie
using AbstractPlotting.GeometryBasics

function add(p::P, point) where P <: Polygon
    Polygon(decompose(Point2f0, p.exterior) .+ point, [decompose(Point2f0, i) .+ point for i in p.interiors])
end

polys = Node(add.(Ref(p), 10 .* rand(Point2f0, 200)))

f, = poly(polys, color = 1:200)

record(f, "test.mp4", 0:1/30:5) do t
    polys[] = map(polys[]) do po
        add(po, 0.01f0 * randn(Point2f0))
    end
end```

elements.text: this worked for me

using CairoMakie
using AbstractPlotting.GeometryBasics

function add(p::P, point) where P <: Polygon
    Polygon(decompose(Point2f0, p.exterior) .+ point, [decompose(Point2f0, i) .+ point for i in p.interiors])
end

polys = Node(add.(Ref(p), 10 .* rand(Point2f0, 200)))

f, = poly(polys, color = 1:200)

record(f, "test.mp4", 0:1/30:5) do t
    polys[] = map(polys[]) do po
        add(po, 0.01f0 * randn(Point2f0))
    end
end
